p: Animal trade data, including date (month and year), number of animals, and country of origin, for all the batches of cattle and camels legally imported into Egypt between 2012 and 2015 was provided by the Quarantine & Inspection Department (QID) of the Ministry of Agriculture and Land Reclamation of Egypt (MALRE). Only cattle and camels from two countries, Ethiopia and Sudan, were legally imported during that period. All cattle and camels imported into Egypt are quarantined, and data on the quarantine facilities in which the imported lots of animals was also provided by the QID.
